Summary: A planet-size, red-green, rapidly blinking light
trends: There have been no other sightings in Isle La Motte
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsDonald came inside and told us he saw a strange looking star, like a double starbut with flashing lights. We went and looked, we saw something and then itdisapeared. We went to get the binoculars and found it, it was like two lightsflashing white, and then red - green - and blue lights flashing very brightly. It didnt seem to be moving. after about a half an hour or so it is stillthere. We all looked through the binoculars and were very intrigued. It isabout the size of a planet in the sky. It is north of us, and a bit west. Weare on an island in Lake Champlain. We remembered reading of a sighting in thelocal paper last week and we looked up the web sight.
